name: Wild Legal
membership: Organisation Nature Rights, Sherpa and Darwin Climax Coalition
goal: The purpose of the association is to develop, by training, studying, promoting and implementing Earth Jurisprudence, a national and international network of actors from the legal world and from civil society committed to recognition of nature's rights and the crime of ecocide. In particular, it offers a training program to stimulate a virtuous evolution of society, towards ecosystem governance, by developing popular education activities open to all.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: Environmental criminal legislation - water directive - ecosystem protection legislation
